channel.title: Supremescape
channel.description:
2 server 718 || 317|| daily update|| decent staff|| starting server||
[size=14pt][i]the 2 server is hosted by a vps and its online 24/7 no lagg at all promise :) [/i][/size] [shadow=red,left]718 Features[/shadow] [spoiler]-all 24 skills working -22 bosses -8 minigames -3 quests -Pking active -Prestiging system (after u prestige it adds additional +exp) -ring or recoil,wealth,x2 xp ring is working -veteran cape -loyalty shop -prestige shop -dungeoneering -doantor zone,donator shop and boss -extreme shop and extreme boss -DICE AND Follower poker active[/spoiler]. [size=12pt][i][b] 718 pictures[/b][/i][/size] [spoiler][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/9b9fut.png[/img]
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/hwzx8z.png[/img]
[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/1aqvn.png[/img][/spoiler]
[shadow=red,left]317 feutures[/shadow] [spoiler]- 24 fully working skills - Skills go up to level 125! - Squeal of Fortune operational: 3 spins given for each 99, 5 spins for a 125. - X bones on altar - Working ring of wealth! - Portals minigame gives 3m reward for players 5m for donators. - Working commands such as ::home, ::funpk, ::chill, and much more. - Ring of recoil fully working - Crystal keys for crystal chests - 8 working minigames: Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Tzhaar, Warriors Guild, Assault & Domination, Nomad & Angry Goblin, Portals Minigame. - Loyalty points with shop - Double XP ring in loyalty shop - Minecraft gear in loyalty shop - Enable/Disable x10 hitting - Enable/Disable New HP bar - All working emotions - ::yell feature for all players - 2 Training areas - Prestige levels with prestige points - Rare drop table, with caskets, crystal keys, d boots. - Secured banks with bank pins[/spoiler] [size=13pt] 317 pictures[/size] [spoiler] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/23hm0k9.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/ayppvp.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[i]to be honest im not a pro coder, like what i told i just study,read and study again to make a rsps thats why im looking for a dedicated staff that will help me run and DEVELOP more the 2 server. [/i]
[size=18pt][i][b]add me on skype :[/b][/i][/size] [spoiler]khen15 / kenneth papango[/spoiler] [size=18pt][u][b]website :[/b][/u][/size][spoiler] www.supremescape.comuf.com[/spoiler] [/center]

item.title: Supremescape
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

2 server 718 || 317|| daily update|| decent staff|| starting server||

[size=14pt]the 2 server is hosted by a vps and its online 24/7 no lagg at all promise [/size]
[shadow=red,left]718 Features[/shadow]
[spoiler]-all 24 skills working
-22 bosses
-8 minigames
-3 quests
-Pking active
-Prestiging system (after u prestige it adds additional +exp)
-ring or recoil,wealth,x2 xp ring is working
-veteran cape
-loyalty shop
-prestige shop
-dungeoneering
-doantor zone,donator shop and boss
-extreme shop and extreme boss
-DICE AND Follower poker active[/spoiler].
[size=12pt]
718 pictures[/size]
[spoiler]

[/spoiler]

[shadow=red,left]317 feutures[/shadow]
[spoiler]- 24 fully working skills

  • Skills go up to level 125!
  • Squeal of Fortune operational: 3 spins given for each 99, 5 spins for a 125.
  • X bones on altar
  • Working ring of wealth!
  • Portals minigame gives 3m reward for players 5m for donators.
  • Working commands such as ::home, ::funpk, ::chill, and much more.
  • Ring of recoil fully working
  • Crystal keys for crystal chests
  • 8 working minigames: Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Tzhaar, Warriors Guild, Assault & Domination, Nomad & Angry Goblin, Portals Minigame.
  • Loyalty points with shop
  • Double XP ring in loyalty shop
  • Minecraft gear in loyalty shop
  • Enable/Disable x10 hitting
  • Enable/Disable New HP bar
  • All working emotions
  • ::yell feature for all players
  • 2 Training areas
  • Prestige levels with prestige points
  • Rare drop table, with caskets, crystal keys, d boots.
  • Secured banks with bank pins[/spoiler]
    [size=13pt]
    317 pictures[/size]
    [spoiler]


    [/spoiler]

to be honest im not a pro coder, like what i told i just study,read and study again to make a rsps thats why im looking for a dedicated staff that will help me run and DEVELOP more the 2 server.

[size=18pt]add me on skype :[/size] [spoiler]khen15 / kenneth papango[/spoiler]
[size=18pt]website :[/size][spoiler] www.supremescape.comuf.com[/spoiler]
[/center]
